Name: Puzzle: Triangles
About the game: Puzzle: Triangles - The game is a challenging and interesting puzzle game. Your goal is to put the pieces of the puzzle together to complete a beautiful picture. You will find a wide variety of pictures from easy to hard, so try to collect them all! Peculiarities: - 15 levels - Beautiful graphics - Pleasant music
